page.title: 20GAMES PLAYED IN DALMALLY
page.content: GAMES WE PLAY: Rounders Rounders is best played outdoors where there is room to run around and hit a ball. You will need one bat,one ball,four markers. The markers(eg beanbags)are placed on the ground to mark the four corners of a large square. Bat and ball should be placed at the bottom left corner of the square. Two teams of equal number are chosen one team will bat while the other retrieves the ball for the bowler. The ball is thrown by the bowler to the first batsman who is allowed three attempts to hit the ball.On a successful hit the batsman run as far round the square as possible before the bowler catches the ball. Each run round the counts as one point. Teams change when there is no one left to bat or if the ball is caught offthebat
